verbs.description: [ARG0: The United States] [V: opened] [ARG1: an embassy] [ARG2: to Jerusalem] [ARGM-TMP: today] [ARGM-ADV: at the order of President Trump , who finally fulfilled a promise former presidents made for decades] .

The United States opened an embassy to Jerusalem today at the order of [ARG0: President Trump] , [R-ARG0: who] [ARGM-TMP: finally] [V: fulfilled] [ARG1: a promise former presidents made for decades] .
The United States opened an embassy to Jerusalem today at the order of President Trump , who finally fulfilled [ARG1: a promise] [ARG0: former presidents] [V: made] [ARGM-TMP: for decades] .
